heading: This Afternoon
text: Cloudy. Snow, could be heavy at times; daytime totals 6 to 10 inches south of Route 4, 4 to 8 inches between Route 4 and Route 2, and 3 to 6 inches from Route 2 northward, except 2 to 4 inches in the St. Lawrence and northern Champlain valleys. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30. Variable winds around 5 mph, becoming north late.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow, mainly from Vermont eastward, and from Route 2 southward, all tapering off by midnight; another trace to 2 inches north, and 2 to 4 inches south, mainly southeast. Lows from the mid teens to mid 20s, north to south. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph, becoming northwest and gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly cloudy south, partly to mostly cloudy north. Highs in the upper 20s to lower 30s, some mid 20s northeast. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph east of the Greens early.
